titles.title: Acquisition Workforce Improvement Act of 2011
A bill to improve the acquisition workforce through the establishment of an acquisition management fellows program and a leadership development training program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2270-2271)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
